personal.name: Gauransh Sirohi
personal.title: MLops Engineer
personal.bio: Passionate about building intelligent systems and leveraging data to solve complex problems. Specialized in deep learning, computer vision, and natural language processing.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Specialized in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence. Thesis on Deep Reinforcement Learning for Robotics.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
education.description: Focus on software engineering and data structures. Graduated with honors.

projects.title: Advanced Image Classification System
projects.description: Built a state-of-the-art image classification model using transfer learning with ResNet-50, achieving 95% accuracy on custom dataset.
projects.detailedDescription:
This project implements a cutting-edge image classification system using deep convolutional neural networks. The model was trained on a dataset of over 100,000 images across 50 categories. Key achievements include:

• Implemented transfer learning with ResNet-50 architecture
• Applied data augmentation techniques to improve generalization
• Achieved 95% accuracy on test set
• Deployed as a REST API using Flask
• Optimized inference time to under 50ms per image
projects.challenges: The main challenge was dealing with class imbalance in the dataset. I addressed this by implementing weighted loss functions and using advanced augmentation techniques.
projects.results: The model achieved 95% accuracy and is currently deployed in production, processing over 10,000 images daily.

projects.title: Real-time Sentiment Analysis Engine
projects.description: Developed an NLP model for real-time sentiment analysis of social media posts using BERT transformers, processing 1000+ posts per minute.
projects.detailedDescription:
A high-performance sentiment analysis system that processes social media posts in real-time. The system uses fine-tuned BERT models to classify text into positive, negative, or neutral sentiments.

• Fine-tuned BERT-base model on custom dataset
• Implemented efficient batch processing
• Built real-time dashboard for monitoring
• Handles multilingual text
• Achieves 92% F1-score on test data
projects.challenges: Optimizing inference speed while maintaining accuracy was crucial. I implemented model quantization and efficient batching strategies.
projects.results: Successfully deployed system processing 1000+ posts per minute with 92% accuracy across multiple languages.

projects.title: Collaborative Filtering Recommendation System
projects.description: Created a hybrid recommendation engine combining collaborative and content-based filtering, improving user engagement by 40%.
projects.detailedDescription:
A sophisticated recommendation system that combines multiple approaches to provide personalized suggestions. The system analyzes user behavior, item features, and social connections.

• Implemented matrix factorization using SVD
• Combined collaborative and content-based filtering
• A/B tested different algorithms
• Scaled to handle millions of users
• Improved user engagement by 40%
projects.challenges: Handling cold start problem for new users and items. Implemented hybrid approach with content-based fallback.
projects.results: Increased user engagement by 40% and average session time by 25%. System serves 5M+ recommendations daily.

projects.title: Real-time Object Detection for Autonomous Systems
projects.description: Implemented YOLO-based object detection system for autonomous navigation, detecting 80+ object classes in real-time at 30 FPS.
projects.detailedDescription:
A real-time object detection system designed for autonomous navigation applications. Built using YOLOv5 architecture and optimized for edge deployment.

• Trained YOLOv5 on custom autonomous driving dataset
• Optimized for real-time inference on embedded systems
• Achieved 30+ FPS on NVIDIA Jetson
• Detects 80+ object classes
• Implemented tracking and prediction
projects.challenges: Achieving real-time performance on edge devices while maintaining accuracy. Used model pruning and TensorRT optimization.
projects.results: Successfully deployed on autonomous platform, achieving 30 FPS with 85% mAP on custom test set.

projects.title: Time Series Forecasting with LSTMs
projects.description: Built an LSTM-based forecasting model for predicting stock prices and market trends with 88% directional accuracy.
projects.detailedDescription:
A sophisticated time series forecasting system using LSTM neural networks. The model analyzes historical data to predict future trends and patterns.

• Implemented multi-layer LSTM architecture
• Feature engineering with technical indicators
• Backtesting framework for validation
• Real-time prediction pipeline
• 88% directional accuracy
projects.challenges: Handling non-stationary data and avoiding overfitting. Implemented walk-forward validation and regularization techniques.
projects.results: Achieved 88% directional accuracy with low false positive rate. Model used for strategic decision making.

projects.title: AI-Powered Customer Service Chatbot
projects.description: Developed an intelligent chatbot using GPT-based models and RAG architecture, handling 85% of customer queries automatically.
projects.detailedDescription:
An intelligent conversational AI system for customer service automation. Uses retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) to provide accurate, context-aware responses.

• Fine-tuned GPT model on company data
• Implemented RAG with vector database
• Multi-turn conversation handling
• Sentiment-aware responses
• 85% query resolution rate
projects.challenges: Ensuring factual accuracy and handling edge cases. Implemented RAG architecture with confidence scoring.
projects.results: Reduced customer service load by 85%, improved response time from hours to seconds, 92% user satisfaction.
